name: Woodlands
description: Survive. Build shelter. Build a fire. Scavenge and kill for materials. Craft. Eat and drink. Do what you need to do to survive.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers Additional Notes: May run on systems with lower specs, but with low framerate.
